title: Andrew Adonis – 2021 Comments on Single Anti-Corruption Candidate in North Shropshire
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Andrew Adonis on 14 November 2021.
content: There should be a single anti-corruption candidate standing to replace Owen Paterson in North Shropshire, supported by Labour, the Lib Dems & the Greens
Time to get real about politics and forge a progressive alliance.
